kawigi.widget
Class SimpleOutputComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  kawigi.widget.SimpleOutputComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ConsoleDisplay
public class SimpleOutputComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ConsoleDisplay

The default display component for compile and program output in processes started by KawigiEdit.

See Also:
Serialized Form
